LightningComponentBundle.description: Responsive sticky header component for eCommerce platform with navigation, search, user account access, and shopping cart functionality

property.name: brandName
property.label: Brand Name
property.description: The brand name displayed in the header logo area

property.name: showSearch
property.label: Show Search Bar
property.description: Flag to show or hide the search functionality in the header

property.name: showUserMenu
property.label: Show User Menu
property.description: Flag to show or hide the user account menu dropdown

property.name: showCart
property.label: Show Shopping Cart
property.description: Flag to show or hide the shopping cart icon and dropdown

property.name: isAuthenticated
property.label: User Authenticated
property.description: Current user authentication status - affects the user menu options displayed
